task.title: Backing up
task.shortdesc: Using the browser interface, you can take a backup of an application that manages, such as .

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface.
Click the Backup / Restore tab. The Backup / Restore page appears.
Click Create Backup. You will be asked to confirm your selection by clicking Create Backup again.
When the backup is complete, you will see the path of the .tgz file displayed.
